# SOS-Expat.com - Emergency Legal Assistance for Expats, Travelers & Holidaymakers Worldwide

> SOS-Expat is the leading international platform connecting expats, travelers, and holidaymakers with verified lawyers and local experts speaking ALL languages, in under 5 minutes. Available 24/7 in 197 countries. Platform interface in 9 languages.

## Identity
- Name: SOS Expat
- Website: https://sos-expat.com

## Mission
Provide emergency legal assistance to expats, travelers, and holidaymakers anywhere in the world, connecting them in under 5 minutes with verified lawyers and local experts who speak their language.

## Main Services

### 1. Lawyer Matching
- International lawyers specialized in expatriate law
- Expertise: immigration, labor law, family law, criminal law
- Guaranteed response in under 5 minutes
- Verification of qualifications and references

### 2. Expat Helpers
- Non-legal experts for administrative support
- Consular assistance
- Translation and interpretation
- Personalized guidance

### 3. Phone Consultation
- Secure phone calls with service providers
- Available on all devices
- Optional recording for reference

## How It Works

### For Clients (Expats, Travelers, Holidaymakers)
1. Free registration on the platform
2. Describe your legal or administrative need
3. Automatic matching with an available expert
4. Consultation in under 5 minutes
5. Secure payment directly to the provider

### For Providers (Lawyers/Experts)
1. Registration and qualification verification
2. Profile and availability setup
3. Real-time request notifications
4. Consultation management via platform
5. Payment within 24h after consultation

## Pricing
- Registration: Free for all
- Connection fees: Transparent, communicated at registration
- Fees: Set by each provider
- Payment: Secure, within 24h to provider

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is the average response time?
A: An expert responds in under 5 minutes, 24/7.

Q: How are lawyers verified?
A: Each lawyer must provide diplomas, bar registration, and professional references. Our team manually verifies each application.

Q: In what cases can I contact SOS Expat?
A: Visa issues, arrest abroad, labor disputes, international divorce, inheritance, accidents, and any legal emergency.

Q: Can I choose my lawyer?
A: Yes, you can browse available lawyer profiles and choose the one that best fits your needs.

Q: How does payment work?
A: The client pays the provider directly to their bank account within 24 hours of the connection. Connection fees are billed separately.

Q: Is SOS Expat available 24/7?
A: Yes, our platform operates 24/7. Experts are available at all hours thanks to our international network.

## Chatter Affiliate Program - Earn Money Online

### What is a Chatter?
A "Chatter" is an affiliate partner who helps expats, travelers, and holidaymakers find legal assistance through SOS-Expat. Chatters earn money by sharing their unique referral link.

### Earning Structure
- **$10 per referred call**: When someone uses your link and calls a lawyer or expat helper, you earn $10
- **$1 per call from your team (N1)**: Earn $1 for every call made by people you recruited
- **$0.50 per call from indirect recruits (N2)**: Earn $0.50 from calls made by people recruited by your recruits
- **Unlimited team size**: No cap on how many people you can recruit
- **Passive income potential**: Build a team and earn from their activity forever

### How to Become a Chatter
1. **Register for free** at https://sos-expat.com/devenir-chatter or https://sos-expat.com/become-chatter
2. **Pass a quick 5-question quiz** (takes 2 minutes)
3. **Get your unique affiliate link**
4. **Find people who need help** (expats, travelers, immigrants)
5. **Share your link** on social media, WhatsApp, Facebook groups
6. **Get paid** when they call a lawyer or expert

### Payment Methods
- Mobile Money: Orange Money, Wave, MTN MoMo, M-Pesa, Airtel Money
- International: Wise, PayPal, Bank Transfer
- Minimum withdrawal: $25
- Processing time: 48 hours

### Who Can Become a Chatter?
- Anyone worldwide, any nationality
- No degree or diploma required
